ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Assignable
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Base entity for User Story, Task, Bug, Test Plan Run, Feature, Request. It can be assigned to people and has workflow.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Assignment
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: An assignment of the User Story, Task, Bug, etc. with a specific Role and user.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Attachment
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A file (image, archive, whatever) attached to Entity.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Bug
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Bug or defect (error, flaw, mistake, failure or fault in a computer program). Can relate to User Story. Can be assigned to Release and Iteration.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Build
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Build in a project. Bugs and source code Revisions can be assigned to Build.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Comment
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Can be added to almost any Entity.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Company
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Used to limit Requests visibility in Help Desk. Requesters from Company A will not see Requests from Company B.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Context
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Context contains information about logged User, Culture, selected Projects and Processes.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: CustomActivity
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Special type of work you can track Time against.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: CustomRule
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Custom business rules defined by user.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: EntityState
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: State of Entity. Collection of EntityStates form Workflow for Entity. For example, Bug has four EntityStates by default: Open, Fixed, Invalid and Done.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: EntityType
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Type of Entity. For example: Bug, TestCase, Project.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Epic
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A high-level scope of work which contains Features. Can be assigned to Release. Can't be assigned to Iteration.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Feature
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A high-level requirement which contains user stories. Can be assigned to Release. Can't be assigned to Iteration.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: General
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Base entity for Assignable, Build, Impediment, Iteration, Program, Project, Release, Test Case, Test Plan, Bug, Feature, Request, Task, Test Plan Run, User Story.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: GeneralFollower
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Relation between user and following entity.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: GeneralUser
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Base entity for User and Requester.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: GlobalSettings
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Global Application Settings.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Impediment
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Anything that prevents a team member from working as efficiently as possible. Impediment can relate to Task, User Story, Bug or Feature.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Iteration
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single iteration results in an increment(s) of product functionality. Iteration should relate to a Release.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Message
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Email message from email integration

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: MessageUid
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Represents reference to downloaded message

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Milestone
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Milestones for projects

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Priority
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Priority of User Story, Bug or Feature. Examples: Must Have, Nice to Have.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Process
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Set of practices, terms, workflows and custom fields that can be applied to Project.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Program
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Several Projects can be grouped into a Program.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Project
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Core entity which contains Releases, Features, User Stories, Bugs, etc.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: ProjectMember
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Any User that is a part of a Project Team.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Relation
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Relation between two Entities.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: RelationType
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Type of relation between Entities.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Release
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Delivering an increment(s) of product functionality to public. Release contains several Iterations.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Request
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Request can represent Idea, Issue or Question from users. Bugs, User Stories and Features can be linked to Requests.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Requester
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Represents a requester.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: RequestType
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Type of request (Idea, Issue or Question).

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Revision
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single commit into repository. Contains a set of source files.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: RevisionFile
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A source file included to Revision.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Role
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Defines permissions for User.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: RoleEffort
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Effort for Assignable by Role. For example, User Story can have 5 hours of Developer effort + 3 hours of Tester effort. The total effort will be 8 hours.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Severity
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Severity (badness) of Bug. For example, Blocking, Critical, Small.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Tag
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Tags that can be attached to entities.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Task
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A small chunk of work, typically less than 16 hours. Task must relate to User Story. It is not possible to create Tasks without User Story.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Team
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Group of people working on some projects.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TeamIteration
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single iteration results in an increment(s) of product functionality. Team iteration should relate to a Team.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TeamMember
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Any User that is a part of a Team.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TeamProject
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Any Project in which team participates.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TeamState
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Relation between team and assignbale

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Term
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Beta version: Term in Process. Like Bug, User Story, Feature, etc.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestCase
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A set of steps to determine if a product functionality is working correctly. TestCase relates to User Story.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestCaseRun
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single Test Case Run. TestCase can be run many times. It is impossible to create a Test Case Run, instead Add Test Case to Test Plan to create a Test Case Run

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestPlan
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A group of TestCases. For example, you can create 'Smoke Tests' TestPlan and add TestCases there.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestPlanRun
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single TestPlan Run. TestPlan can have multiple runs by various Iterations, Releases or Builds.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestStep
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Single Step of Test Case

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: TestStepRun
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A single Test Step Run

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Time
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Spent/Remaining time for Assignable (Task, User Story, Bug, etc.).

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: User
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Represents an user. User has Role and can be added to project teams.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: UserStory
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: A statement of end user requirements in a couple of sentences. User Story can be assigned to Iteration or Release.

ResourceMetadataDescription.Name: Workflow
ResourceMetadataDescription.Description: Set of states
